featured_question.question: We want to make  e-commerce website and android app  with payment gateway
featured_question.answer: The best way to make an e-commerce app and website is to use Woocommerce. WordPress is one of the most popular content management systems in the world and Woocommerce is one of the most popular e-commerce plugins for WordPress. WordPress is open source and has thousands of themes and plugins available. Woocommerce is one of the easiest e-Commerce platforms to setup. It has all the features you need to start a successful e-Commerce business: sales, support, product page, checkout page, customer dashboard, stock management, and product management.

Their team displayed a remarkable level of professionalism, technical expertise, and commitment to our project. featured_reviews.review_id: I had requirement for a booking website and mobile application development, so I was searching for a reputed web development company in Bangalore. I found W3 Dream Solutions in top ranking and contacted them. I asked for provide a quotation, but they asked to schedule a meeting and discussion in details to process for quotation and it was a good moment for me to understand all technical things for my project and took forward. Finally, they have demonstrated a nice portal after completion.

featured_reviews.review_id: I was searching for somebody to develop my web portal. I didn't know more about web designing company, so I found many companies on Internet and tried contacting them. Finally I called Dinesh Sir and engaged with his team for my dream project.They helped me from scratch to final deployment and my portal is up now. I appreciate the work and support provided till now and also expecting further support and maintenance.
